projects.title: Jumpstart ~ Static
projects.deck: My Yeoman generator for kicking off Assemble based, static sites fast.

projects.title: mxbry.com
projects.deck: This website you're reading right now! An exercise in little animations, and super lean web builds.

projects.title: Deploy
projects.deck: A Yeoman generator for a variety of configuration files involved in Django deployments; including uWSGI, NGINX, & Supervisor.
